requestedMeal: Fried Potatoes with Pancetta and Mushrooms
description: Tender small potato sticks or small cubes (not wedges) pan-fried with savory pancetta and earthy mushrooms until golden but not overly crispy, creating a comforting dish with soft texture, served with fresh herbs and a simple side salad

imagePrompt.base: Vibrant close-up of Fried Potatoes with Pancetta and Mushrooms, plated to showcase vivid textures and color. Incorporate visual cues from this description: Tender small potato sticks or small cubes (not wedges) pan-fried with savory pancetta and earthy mushrooms until golden but not overly crispy, creating a comforting dish with soft texture, served with fresh herbs and a simple side salad. Scene: italian-inspired table with soft natural daylight, eye-level perspective, and shallow depth of field. Capture fresh garnish, inviting lighting, and a sense of homemade comfort with no visible steam or vapor. No people or branded props.
imagePrompt.enhanced: An intimate close-up, slightly elevated, of golden-kissed, tender potato sticks artfully mounded on a rustic plate. Savory, crisp pancetta and earthy mushrooms are nestled throughout. A vibrant sprinkle of fresh parsley adds a pop of green. Bathed in luminous, soft natural light, shallow depth of field accentuates comforting textures. A simple side salad peeks invitingly, completing this homemade Italian-inspired comfort scene.
